data.title: Lesson 1: A Very Long Way: Reading
data.meta_description: Clase 2 - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Martin Strel is a long-distance swimmer from Slovenia who has drawn attention to water issues by swimming some of the world's longest rivers. [1] He has swum rivers like the Mississippi, Parana, Yangtze, and Colorado. [2] His most famous achievement was swimming the entire Amazon River in 2007, a distance of over 5,430 km, making him the first person to ever complete the swim. [3] Strel hopes to raise awareness of water pollution issues through his extreme swimming feats.
data.text: Lesson 1: A Very Long Way: Reading
